Attributes.description: A workshop class in writing of drama for the stage. Studio work is required, and some plays may be given a live stage production in Brave New Play Rites (adjudication process involved).
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Restricted to Majors in Creative Writing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 12:00, End Time: 14:00, Building: Irving, Room: K
